<Link id="l03327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the current token is an SP3 &#39;neg&#39; modifier.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is interpreted as integer negation rather</span></CodeLine>
